name: Snowman Games and Christmas Puzzles - Match snow and frozen jewel for this holiday countdown
name_original: Snowman Games and Christmas Puzzles - Match snow and frozen jewel for this holiday countdown
description:
Do you want to build a snowman? Help Snowlaf match snow orbs and ice crystals to save his frozen kingdom!

Key Features:
▶ MUCH easier than other matching games.
▶ Over 3000 levels - with more being added!
▶ Challenge friends and other players through Game Center.
▶ Unlock powerful items.
▶ Super cute characters.

Download for FREE! *Limited time only.*
